title: Day 11 - Learned about Blender and Cryptocurrency
content:
• In the Blender course, I learned about Bézier Curves, Bevel vertex, and many more options in Blender. I made a bowling ball and pins today. The process of making things in blender is time taking but fun to do.
  • Today I watched the second episode of Cryptocurrency Investing Masterclass and learned about why so many currencies exist, how to choose the currency to invest in, what is mining, what is proof of work, and what is proof of stake.
author: Aarush Popli
